Beta

Sign up for the beta program.

Maestro Analytics is currently running a beta program where companies can test ELTMaestro in their own server enviornment for free.

Beta users get access to the same software as the sandbox but can see how it performs in their data warehouse.

If the software proves to be as useful as we say it is for your organization, at the conculsion of the beta program, you'll be eligable for a major discount.
